item.title: -317- (delta) Smithing issues
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

blitz_9100:

Creating a completely realistic smithing like rs would require showing a interface,populating the interface with the correct smithing items for bar, waiting for a selection, then checking the level based on the bar and swapping the items.

I know what you are saying but i hav no idea how to do it and i can’t find any tuts that show me how could you help or giv me an example of some code for it??

Read full topic

item.title: -317- (delta) Smithing issues
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2349 && playerHasItem(2347)){ deleteItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the bar into a platebody."); addItem(1117, 1); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2351 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(2351, 1); showInterface(994); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2359 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(2359, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 1200); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2361 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(2361, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 2000); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2363 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(2363, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 150); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 436 && playerHasItem(438)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore and get a bronze bar."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 438 && playerHasItem(436)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore and get a bronze bar"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 440 && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(440, 1); addItem(995, 5000); sM("You smith the iron ore and get 5k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(1500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 447 && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(447, 1); addItem(995, 20000); sM("You smith the mithril ore and get 20k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 449 && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(449, 1); addItem(995, 75000); sM("You smith the adamant ore and get 75k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 451 && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(451, 1); addItem(995, 150000); sM("You smith the runite ore and get 150k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000, 13); } if ((UsedOnObjectID == 2781) || (UsedOnObjectID == 2728)) { // furnace, range if ( /* CheckForSkillUse2(ItemID, ItemSlot) == */true) {

this is currently wat the coding looks like for smithing. besides a few small changes it is exactly the same as when i downloaded the source. this is in my client.java file

does anyone no how to make it so it is similar to “real” rs. I want the menu to come up when u use the bar on the anvil that gives you options on what u want to make like a platebody for 5 bars or something els for a smaller number of bars.
could someone give me an example of their coding for smithing or at least try to explain to me how they did it.

thanx in advance
